column4: anybody able to tell me how much better 10.04 will run if I upgrade from 512 ram to 2g (I have a 1.86GHz Pentium M CPU, 5 years old)
if you notice it paging stuff to disk all the time now, then you'll notice a lot of improvement going to 2g.
use the 'free' command to see ram/swap usage
also, the disk usage indicator light, and the characteristic disk spinning cracking noise tell you if disk is being used. :)
